attributes.action: Teach CPR and basic first aid as part of the school cirriculum.
attributes.additional_details:
CPR and basic first aid is a life skill that should be taught from a young age. 
Having the knowledge or an idea of what to do in an emergency could mean the difference for someone between life and death. 
According to https://www.statista.com/statistics/281174/uk-population-by-age/ 
In 2019 there were approximately 7.61million children aged between 10 and 19. If half of these were taught first aid it would make a huge difference.
attributes.background: Introduce CPR and basic first aid into school cirriculum. At least for senior school aged children.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584705
